text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.title: Zombified Player
text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.option.s: Spawn a zombified player after death
If enabled, a zombified player will spawn after death | default: true
text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.option.t: Transfer the players inventory to the zombified player
If enabled, the inventory of the dead player will be transfered to the zombified player | default: true
